message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its potential value, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000. I believe this reflects a fair deal considering its worth.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth and the market value.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the pricing. However,  $850,000 undervalues the true potential and benefits of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway - how about we agree on $900,000? This reflects the value it can bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $900,000. How about we try $875,000? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product at this price, but I need to stay within my budget.
